com.pushtechnology.diffusion.transform.adder

Interface UnboundTopicAdderBuilder<S,T,U extends TopicAdder<T>>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - The type of value understood by the topic
    T - The type of value updates are provided as
    U - The type of adder created by this builder
    All Superinterfaces:
    TopicAdderBuilder<S,T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    UnboundSafeTopicAdderBuilder<S,T>, UnboundTransformedTopicAdderBuilder<S,T>

    public interface UnboundTopicAdderBuilder<S,T,U extends TopicAdder<T>>
extends TopicAdderBuilder<S,T>
    An extension to TopicAdderBuilder that is not bound to a session.
    Author:
    Push Technology Limited
